column4: i cant gain access to my cellphone, i have plugged it in as an USB key, but it will not auto detect, how do i maually detect it so i can transfer files to it?
i cant gain access to my cellphone, i have plugged it in as an USB key, but it will not auto detect, how do i maually detect it so i can transfer files to it?
type in "dmesg"   does it recognize the device?  disconnect and reconnect and type dmesg again
and i have reconnected a couple of times
